about_the_game:
Golf Rush is a golfing game where the goal is not to hit in the least strokes possible but instead by being the fastest golfer.
You race your friends in this multiplayer golf racing game!

Features

  • Golfing

    You golf by timing both the direction of the shot and the power of the swing.
    Watch out for aggressive competetors! They might smack you with their golf club...
  • Golfcart Drift Racing

    To get to you ball you will need to be fast. The golfcart will help you do just that.
    Thanks to the drifting boost mechanics you will be able to reach high speeds!
  • Powerups

    Sometimes you need that extra edge in the competition. Use a collection of different powerups to help you win!
  • Obstacles
    There are a collection of obstacles that interact with you, your car or your ball.
    The boost ramp which launches your car, The hoops that launch your ball, The bonus areas that give you extra points and many more map specific obstacles!
  • Rush Mode
    If you and your friends want an extra challenge you could try the Rush mode. Here all players share only one ball!
    Score by hitting the ball as far as possible with a boost for the player that scores in the hole.
  • Loads of maps!

    With 4 unique maps there will never be a boring moment!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Golf Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Did you ever think golfing was too slow? Well, no longer! Golf Rush is a party game in which you and up to 8 friends race for the hole. Using a fast, drifting golf cart to get to your ball.
